Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>はどうしてクレアさんちに？
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, why do you live with Claire?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……オレの親はオレが生まれてすぐ 亡くなったんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...My parents died soon after I was born.

Entry.JapaneseText: その後、オレを引き取ったじいさんも亡くなって、 それ以来、クレアの家で世話になっている……
Entry.EnglishText: My grandfather took me in, but then he passed away too. I've been living at Claire's house ever since.
Entry.Notes: Not sure if this jiisan is supposed to be grandfather or old man but I'm not sure it really matters...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか、じゃあ、<Veigue>も両親の顔を 知らないんだ……ボクと同じだネ。
Entry.EnglishText: So you don't remember your parent's faces either... Just like me.
